description:
Contemporary style, free breakfast near station and arena

Convention convenience

Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street occupies a prime location, 5 minutes' walk from Birmingham city center and 15 minutes from New Street Station. It's a 5-minute walk to the Birmingham International Convention Centre and 8 minutes to NIA (National Indoor Arena).

Cadbury World treats

You'll be a 5-minute walk from Brindley Place, where you'll find a wide range of restaurants and canalside bars and pubs, and to the adjacent National Sea Life Centre. Chocolate lovers of all ages will want to visit Cadbury World, a 10-minute drive from the hotel.

Free morning buffet

You'll be able get your day off to a great start with a free hot buffet breakfast, and you can wind down in the evening with a drink in the friendly bar. Snacks are available around the clock, and a fitness center is on site.

Free WiFi, skyline views

Smoke-free guestrooms come with free WiFi, along with flat-screen TVs, coffee/tea makers, and a choice of pillows. Each room also features a panoramic view of the city skyline.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Contemporary style, free breakfast near station and arena

Convention convenience

Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street occupies a prime location, 5 minutes' walk from Birmingham city center and 15 minutes from New Street Station. It's a 5-minute walk to the Birmingham International Convention Centre and 8 minutes to NIA (National Indoor Arena).

Cadbury World treats

You'll be a 5-minute walk from Brindley Place, where you'll find a wide range of restaurants and canalside bars and pubs, and to the adjacent National Sea Life Centre. Chocolate lovers of all ages will want to visit Cadbury World, a 10-minute drive from the hotel.

Free morning buffet

You'll be able get your day off to a great start with a free hot buffet breakfast, and you can wind down in the evening with a drink in the friendly bar. Snacks are available around the clock, and a fitness center is on site.

Free WiFi, skyline views

Smoke-free guestrooms come with free WiFi, along with flat-screen TVs, coffee/tea makers, and a choice of pillows. Each room also features a panoramic view of the city skyline.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The hotel offers a snack bar/deli. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning. A computer station is located on site and high-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary.

A 24-hour business center is on site at this 3-star property. This family-friendly hotel also offers a fitness center, tour/ticket assistance, and multilingual staff. Onsite parking is available (surcharge).

Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value: A complimentary buffet breakfast is served each morning between 6 AM and 10 AM.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
National Indoor Arena
Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street is 15 minutes on foot from New Street Station, and a 10-minute walk from the National Indoor Arena. Guests can walk 5 minutes to the shops, pubs, and restaurants of the Brindleyplace canalside development. Cadbury World is a 10-minute drive from the hotel.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Self parking fee: GBP 10.00 per day
  • Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

ROOM_FEATURE.value: When you stay at Hampton by Hilton Birmingham Broad Street, you'll be within a 15-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Barclaycard Arena. You can visit the fitness center for a workout or unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. Other highlights include a snack bar/deli, and rooms offer LCD TVs and pillow menus.
